item.title: A Park Full of Cats
item.description:
Title: A Park Full of Cats
Genre: Casual , Indie
Developer: Devcats
Publisher: Devcats
Franchise: Devcats
Release Date: Sep 9, 2024




About This Game



Welcome to 'A Park Full of Cats,' a hidden object game that invites you to revel in the enchanting world of amusement parks! Experience the thrill and excitement of the rides and give those cats the fun they truly deserve!



At the center of the park, FofiÃ±o takes the stage! Search for the cats that'll join him in making this an unforgettable show! Explore every nook and cranny, from the Roller Coasters to the Bumper Cars and the towering Ferris Wheels, to find these playful cats!

"A Park Full of Cats" features:

One Enormous Scenario: Immerse yourself in a vast, single-screen scenario, brimming with hidden cats. It's the largest and most intricately designed setting we've created, ensuring you have plenty to explore.

Fun and Games: Experience the amusement park like never before as you locate hidden cats and unlock new achievements. The thrill of the rides is just a click away!

Free Admission: 'A Park Full of Cats' is not only an amusement park for cats but also for players. The ticket to this adventure is absolutely FREE, giving everyone a chance to have fun and find all the cats without any cost.

Countless Cats: As you delve into the world of amusement, you'll encounter a plethora of playful feline companions, each with their unique charm. Can you find them all?

So, grab your virtual ticket, hop on the rides, and embark on an unforgettable adventure at 'A Park Full of Cats.'. Get ready to enjoy a day at the amusement park and discover the magic that happens when cats have their own playground!

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

Linux

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Season Pass
item.description:
Title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 - Season Pass
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: Saber Interactive
Publisher: Focus Entertainment
Franchise: Warhammer
Release Date: Sep 9, 2024




About This Content

Save money on additional content for Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 with the Season Pass and receive armour, weapon and Champion cosmetics from your favorite Space Marine chapters through four phases. Content can be downloaded from the store or in-game upon release.

Available at launch:

- Ultramarines Cosmetic Pack

Season 2 (before end of 2024)

- Dark Angels Cosmetic Pack
- Dark Angels Champion Pack
- Dark Angels Weapon Skin Pack

Season 3 (Winter 2025)

One Space Marine Chapter (to be revealed) will receive a Champion Pack, a Cosmetic Pack and a Weapon Skin Pack
Another Space Marine Chapter (to be revealed) will receive a Champion Pack.

Season 4 (Spring 2025)

One Space Marine Chapter (to be revealed) will receive a Champion Pack, a Cosmetic Pack and a Weapon Skin Pack
Another Space Marine Chapter (to be revealed) will receive a Champion Pack.

The Season Pass is included in the Ultra Edition and Gold Edition. Requires the base game Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Gameplay consists of frequent combat scenarios with characters using their weapons to slash/stab enemies.

Strong Language is used in the dialogue.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (1903 min)/11 64-bit
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X / Intel Core i5-8600K
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 580 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 75 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD required. 30 FPS in 1920x1080 with "Low" preset.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (1903 min)/11 64-bit
    • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X / Intel Core i7-12700
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT / Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 75 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: SSD required. 60 FPS in 1920x1080 with the "Ultra" preset.

item.title: Zero Hour
item.description:
Title: Zero Hour
Genre: Action , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: M7 Productions , Attrito
Publisher: Attrito , M7 Productions
Release Date: Sep 9, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Aug 12, 2020




About This Game


Welcome to Zero Hour, a tactical FPS with online team-based action gameplay that is set across various locations in Bangladesh with real-life scale & resource management. Join forces with up to 10 players in intense cooperative missions, or go solo with up to 9 AI squad mates. Experience hostage rescue and bomb defusal missions that require calculated strategies in the dynamic 5v5 PvP mode. Shape your route through compelling situations by interacting with story-driven NPCs and engaging with various objectives.

Intense PvP Action


Engage in intense 5v5 PvP battles across various game modes, including bomb defusal, hostage rescue, and deathmatch. Experience competitive gameplay with a comprehensive leaderboard and tier system. Choose your loadout wisely, as limited guns and gadgets add a strategic layerâ€”you'll lose them upon dying, making every decision critical.

Intense Tactical Action


Zero Hour presents serious slow-paced, and methodically intense gameplay. The game offers authentic gunplay and scenarios, where quick thinking and strategic execution are essential for victory. Utilize the planning table to overview operations and formulate your approach before taking action. Remember, every move counts, and success demands teamwork, strategy, and precision.

Innovative Gameplay Elements and Weapon Customization


Explore over 18 diverse maps set across various locations in Bangladesh, featuring unique elements like functional elevators, bulletproof glass, and dynamic shutters for strategic advantages. Strategically utilize the breaker switch to control building lights, adding tactical depth to your missions.
Choose from over 23 distinct weapons and 18 utilities, emphasizing resource management and team coordination. Fine-tune your arsenal with detailed weapon customization, modifying rails, sights, and foregrips for optimal performance. Immerse yourself in realism by checking magazine bullet counts and repacking magazines for efficiency.

Dynamic Door Mechanics


Doors are your lifeline and your barrier. Infiltrate with caution as terrorists set traps and alarms. Meanwhile, attackers have an arsenal of over 4 breach options: kick, door rammer, C2 explosives, and back kick combined with grenades, ensuring a variety of strategies to navigate these vital entry points.

Dynamic Suspect AI


Face a variety of suspects, each with distinct behaviors. Some even wield suicide bombs, while others utilize sniper tactics in long-range maps. They even have the ability to sense incoming fire and strategically time their advances ensuring maximum safety. The dynamic nature of suspects keeps you on your toes, with no guarantee of their next move.

Your K9 Companion


The K9 Attack Dog feature brings an immersive and emotional experience to your missions. As the game starts, you're assigned as a dog handler, initiating your journey with a small, nameable puppy. Initially resting in a cage, the puppy soon becomes interactive and starts playing around, following the player through the training facility. After successfully completing three missions, the canine companion becomes available for mission deployment.



Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Includes blood and violence.
Includes Gore.
Includes school shooter situation.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit versions required)
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 750TI 2GB or AMD R7 260X 2GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 25 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectXÂ® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit versions required)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
    • Memory: 12 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 960 4GB or AMD R9 290 4GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Network: Broadband Internet connection
    • Storage: 25 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectXÂ® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers

item.title: WHAT THE CAR?
item.description:
Title: WHAT THE CAR?
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , Indie , Racing
Developer: Triband
Publisher: Triband
Franchise: WHAT THE GAMES?
Release Date: Sep 9, 2024




About This Game

NOT YOUR TYPICAL RACING GAME

Youâ€™re a car with legs! Race through hundreds of unique levels: jump, fly with jetpacks, climb tall buildings, deliver packages, and do pretty much everything you canâ€™t do in a normal racing game.

BE A CAR AND EXPLORE THE WORLD

Itâ€™s not all about the need for speed. Explore the many islands to meet new friends, find hidden treasures or solve quirky puzzles. Hint: Look behind the waterfalls!

LOADS OF WAYS TO RACE

You will be racing, but it's never what you expect.
Hint: Just go with the flow

OKAY, IT GETS REALLY SILLY

Youâ€™ll be flipping burgers, fishing, swimming, and singing CAR-aoke!
Hint: Donâ€™t talk to the laser cow

CREATE YOUR OWN LEVELS
Make your own wacky levels, share them with friends and family, or climb the leaderboards of quirky levels made by other players.
Hint: Adding cute bears and speed pads that go vroom works every time!

ðŸš¨ DISCLAIMER:
This game is for entertainment purposes only and will absolutely not improve your driving skills in any way. If anything itâ€™ll make you worse. No one on the development team even owns a car. What the hell is a clutch?

ðŸ’£ SPOILER ALERT:
ALERT: A spoiler is apparently a thing you can attach to the back of a car to make it look cool... Who knew?!

System Requirements

item.title: Utopia Must Fall
item.description:
Title: Utopia Must Fall
Genre: Action , Indie , Early Access
Developer: Pixeljam
Publisher: Pixeljam
Franchise: Pixeljam
Release Date: Sep 9, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Sep 9, 2024




About This Game

Utopia Must Fall is a vector-flavored base-defending arcade shooter with rapid progression, procedurally generated attack waves and enough upgrade variety to suit both the defensive or aggressive player.

It incorporates elements from tower defense, roguelites and beyond, all neatly packaged into a laser-sharp bullet-purgatory arcade frenzy!



  • Easy To Learn : firing happens automatically, just steer the city's turret and launch the occasional sky-clearing nuclear warhead. Each day of survival is rewarded with an upgrade for your defenses, choose wisely to keep humanity alive for as long as possible.
  • Sizable Upgrade Tree : progress is fast and allows you to pick strategies to suit your playing style â€” beef up your rail gun into a multi-barrel death machine, strengthen your shield's auto defense abilities, deploy and configure an array of automated laser turrets, or go all out on aggression and see out Utopia's final days with a stockpile of nukes and a shotgun the size of a building.



  • Arcade-Focused : there is no meta-progression â€” in Utopia Must Fall, all universes are created equal, and death is final. Earn upgrades and unlock new abilities by completing mini-challenges as you defend the city. Get good to get the good stuff!
  • Laser-Shiny : built with our brand-new V99 graphics engine, bringing you the retro-modern vector arcade style you didn't know you needed yet.
  • Darkly Humorous : the world is ending soon, what else is there left to do but laugh?
  • Affordable : reasonably priced to help offset the unreasonable cost of everything else.

This game is a work-in-progress . Contact us in the Utopia Must Fall category on the Pixeljam discord (https://discord.gg/JM2MMUf) or in the Steam forums to give feedback, bug reports, feature suggestions, etc. Here is what's planned next:



Descrierea conÈ›inutului pentru adulÈ›i indisponibilÄƒ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
    • Processor: 1 Ghz CPU
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent, Integrated cards also work
    • Storage: 250 MB available space
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

    Minimum:
    • Requires an Apple processor
    • OS: 10.15 or higher
    • Processor: Apple M1 or better - 1 Ghz CPU
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Storage: 250 MB available space
